item.title: EF Core 6 EntityTypeConfiguration Attribute
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop A new attribute called EntityTypeConfiguration was introduced in Entity Framework 6, which allows for easier configuration of custom entity configurations. Let’s take a look at how is simplifies the configuration of an entity. Configurations previously There are a number of steps performed when manually configuring an entity using Entity Framework Core (EF).
